import { useState } from "react"; import styles from "../styles/Enquiry.module.css"; import ImageUpload from "./ImageUpload"; function EnquiryForm() { const selectYes = function () { document.getElementById("idleText").value = "있음 (유)"; }; const selectNo = function () { document.getElementById("idleText").value = "없음 (무)"; }; document.addEventListener("submit", function (e) { e.preventDefault(); const idle = { idle: document.getElementsByName("idle")[0].checked, }; let xhr = new XMLHttpRequest(); xhr.open("POST", "/send-idle"); xhr.setRequestHeader("content-type", "application/json"); xhr.onload = function () { if (xhr.responseText == "success") { console.log("Email sent"); } else { console.log("Something went wrong..."); } }; xhr.send(JSON.stringify(idle)); }); return (
); } export default EnquiryForm;
